name: Crippling Adventure
description:
Welcome to Crippling Adventure!
STORY
Wizards of the old world, these word are for you:
In a quest of great courage, I, the curse, met.
Every injuries cause great suffering to the unfortunate soul who dared step on the ground of the prophecy.
Hidden treasure are lurking in these cave, but at what cost,
Will you enter the beast?

CONTROL
WASD: WALKING
Space: Shield
Left click: Attack
Right click: Vortex

This game was made during the GMTK GAMEJAM 2020.
